tasks.title: Welcome screen
tasks.description: Show recent files and create/open actions
tasks.details:
• Grid with MRU file list.
• Buttons: Create new, Open….
• Toggle to skip screen next launch.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Recent files list updates after open/save.
2) Skip option persists.
3) Empty state shown when no MRU.

tasks.title: Import/Export tasks
tasks.description: Support JSON import and export with validation
tasks.details:
• Validate schema on import.
• Export current master as pretty JSON.
• Non-destructive merge on import.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Invalid schema rejected with clear error.
2) Export round-trips without loss.
3) Merge preserves IDs and dependencies.

tasks.title: Cloud sync (manual)
tasks.description: Add manual sync button to push/pull tasks
tasks.details:
• Toolbar button "Sync" with last sync time.
• Basic conflict dialog with choose-local/choose-remote.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Push then pull reproduces server state.
2) Conflict dialog appears for divergent edits.
3) Choice applies correctly.

tasks.title: Task reordering via drag-and-drop
tasks.details:
• Drag handle in list rows.
• Keyboard reordering with Alt+Up/Down.
• Persist order in file and reload reliably.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Drag updates order visually and in data.
2) Keyboard reorders within bounds.
3) Reload preserves order.

tasks.title: Inline task editing
tasks.description: Edit title and priority directly in the list
tasks.details:
• Click-to-edit title with Enter/Esc handling.
• Priority dropdown pill.
• Validation for non-empty title.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Enter saves, Esc cancels.
2) Priority changes update immediately.
3) Empty titles not allowed.

tasks.title: Bulk status updates
tasks.description: Select multiple tasks and change status
tasks.details:
• Multi-select with Shift/Meta.
• Context menu actions for status set.
• Toast summary of changes.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Multi-select reflects correct count.
2) Bulk status applies to all selected.
3) Undo option available for 5s.

tasks.title: Accessibility pass
tasks.description: Ensure list and editor meet a11y criteria
tasks.details:
• ARIA roles/labels for list, buttons, dialogs.
• Keyboard navigation across all controls.
• Contrast and focus ring checks.
tasks.testStrategy:
1) Tab order logical and cyclical.
2) Screen reader announces actions and context.
3) Minimum contrast 4.5:1 maintained.
